tablecol.label:
Current Custodian
Status
I : Inactive
A : Active

Current Custodian
have the Key From

helpgrid.innerhtml: To generate asset numbers for the whole hierarchy in the Item Assembly Structure, click Autonumber All. Alternatively, enter the asset numbers for the first level in the hierarchy in the Asset Hierarchy table. To move to the second level in the hierarchy, click the detail button next to the Item field in the table and select Move To.
Use this action if you have reset the meter or replaced it with a different physical meter.

To change the asset's current status from UP to DOWN or DOWN to UP, select Change Status. To record the start and end of the asset's downtime, which leaves the asset in its current status, select Report Downtime.
